review_text: Over all great service inside the bank, as for the atm it never works when you need it too. Itâ€™s like itâ€™s always out of money or something.

Went to the bank this morning before work and arrived around 10:10am. There was a single car at the drive in, so we pulled behind, thinking itâ€™d be quicker than going inside. BIG mistake. After about a min the car leaves and we pull up. Weâ€™re waiting a solid 5 mins before someone even comes to the window. Thereâ€™s literally 4 tellers and 1 customer. After hitting the call button twice, someone finally comes and just opens the drawer, my husband grabs a slip and she closes the drawer, doesnâ€™t say anything, and  just walks away. So I fill out the slip and wait. And wait. And wait. Mind you, ONE customer. We hit the call button and nothing. So, I honked the horn, which I generally would NEVER do. However, itâ€™s been close to 10 mins since getting the slip and I have to drive to Hartford to go to work. The teller helping the only customer turns around and continues to YELL that Iâ€™m the next in line, that theyâ€™re busy, (but theyâ€™re not!) and itâ€™s extremely disrespectful that I honked. Then says I wonâ€™t be helped and can go to a different branch! All I needed was a simple withdrawal. I know I shouldnâ€™t have honked, but she seriously overreacted. I am still a customer, not her child, and she was being FARRR more disrespectful by yelling at me. Anyway, we left (at 10:25). She was probably in her early 30s, hispanic, and had dark hair. This is just a savings account that I have here. However, I think Iâ€™ll take my business elsewhere and close the account. The whole thing left a terrible taste in my mouth and I wish I had gotten her name. Iâ€™ve worked in customer service for the past 17 years and would NEVER treat a customer in such a disgusting and disgraceful manner! Shame on you! Do yourself a favor and donâ€™t bank here, or at least not at this branch!
